attributes.action: Introduce a system for the evaluation of the suitability of people that make judgements in our judicial system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Evaluations on a regular basis,of all those that judge their peers,from magistrates to the Lord Chief Justice.
As a layman,I find that I am reading the the results of some court decisions that beggar belief,surely I am not alone in thinking that a lot these people lack sufficient intellect to hold these positions.
Regular evaluations,as in other fields of the Civil Service,should be made mandatory.
